content.en: Underwater acoustic algorithms: Researchers have proposed various algorithms to enhance different aspects of underwater acoustic communications. For example, the iterative adaptive approach (IAA) and RELAX-BLAST algorithm are suggested to improve channel estimation and symbol detection in high-speed MIMO underwater acoustic communications. Another algorithm implements overlapped-window FDE and decision-directed channel estimation to achieve bandwidth-efficient frequency-domain equalization in single carrier MIMO underwater acoustic communications. These algorithms aim to optimize the performance and efficiency of underwater communication systems.
content.da: Undervandsakustiske algoritmer: Forskere har foreslået forskellige algoritmer for at forbedre forskellige aspekter af undervandsakustisk kommunikation. For eksempel er den iterative adaptive tilgang (IAA) og RELAX-BLAST algoritmen foreslået for at forbedre kanalsestimering og symboldetektering i højhastigheds MIMO undervandsakustisk kommunikation. En anden algoritme implementerer overlappende vindue FDE og beslutningsdirigeret kanalsestimering for at opnå båndbreddeeffektiv frekvensdomænelige udligning i enkeltbærer MIMO undervandsakustisk kommunikation. Disse algoritmer sigter mod at optimere ydeevnen og effektiviteten af undervandskommunikationssystemer.
